name: annie bucket hat
notes:
p**s: ⭐️ i'm a season 8 knit star! ⭐️ shop this season's masterclasses $20 off during the early bird sales window april 21-30 [here][1].**

a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog [here.][2] 

serve up some annie hall meets jamiroquai vibes in this statement making faux fur hat. part bucket hat, part bowler/cloche, it’s an iconic shape with a modern touch that’s sure to turn heads all season.

shop the full kit [here.][3] 

**sizes**
1 (2, 3, 4)
head circumference suggested ease: (-)2 – (+)1”/(-)5 – (+2.5)cm
pictured in size 3 on model with 21”/53cm head

**finished dimensions**
circumference: 14 (17.25, 20.5, 23.5)”/35.5 (44, 52, 60)cm
crown height: 4 (5, 6, 7)”/ 10 (13, 15.5, 18)cm

**difficulty level**
easy

**skills**
magic loop
single crochet in the round

all patterns are written in standard us terms.
